snippet.title: Portal Stories: Mel - Trailer
snippet.description:
Portal Stories: Mel! Out now! Download it on Steam, free!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/317400

Portal Stories: Mel is a community made, free modification for Portal 2 based in the Portal universe. It tells the story of Mel, who meets a new personality core and faces an undiscovered threat to the Aperture facility.

Main Features:
- 23 Puzzle and exploration filled maps 
- Custom Story and Dialogue 
- Custom Textures, Models and Animations 
- 70s Prototype Portal Gun 
- Free to Play (you must own Portal 2)

Steam Greenlight page:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=286098917

You can follow the mod's progress on:

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/portalstories

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PortalStories

Music:
Troubled Water by Harry Callaghan (from the official soundtrack)

For media enquiries: 
Please contact us with an e-mail address from your website at:
press@portalstories.com

A lot of you were wondering where I've been lately. Why, helping out this fine team on this awesome mod of course! Regular programming will resume shortly. ;) 

-----

Follow me if you want: =)

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Harry101UK

Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/Harry101UK

Tumblr:
http://harrycallaghan.tumblr.com/

-----
